Name: Neon Rage
About the game: Fight, collect, survive. This is NEON. Welcome to the distant planet Neon. This place is unlike any other. Unique atmosphere on this planet makes everything UV fluorescent. Your time here will not be that adorable though. Prepare to embrace the dangers of the world of Neon! Fight for your survival and defeat dangerous creatures inhabiting this mesmerizing world. The ever glowing NEON will offer you colourful and unique maps with progress through a campaign mode. You can also try your best skills in special modes that are tailored for each map. Survive for as long as you can, fight with your swords only or defeat as many Ragens as you can. These modes will be constantly growing as we will continue to add new ones. To help you in your combat you can use a sword, a shield or pistol. Each of these can be transformed into more powerful weapons to give you some boost and deal more damage. Main Features Intense Combat Unique World of Planet NEON Alien Creatures Boss Fight Transformable Weapons Immersive Virtual Reality The night is long, cold and dangerous. One thing is certain though. The night is never dark. This place truly shines. Leafs, trees and even flowers brighten this beautiful alien world. But don't let it deceive you. The planet isn't suited for for those faint of heart. Danger lurks everyone and the ecosystem has been a fertile breeding ground for vicious animal forms. Grab your weapons and survive the night!
